summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pantene Pro-V Damage Detox Rebuilding Conditioner 24 fl oz Review Date: 2015/01/05 Store: Pantene Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pantene', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Frizzy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '24 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4 x 2.8 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '080878177301', 'Manufacturer': 'Pantene'} Review Text: It does make my hair soft but, I can't take the minty smell it has! I use Pantene products all the time and was shocked when I was in the shower and put this conditioner on my head. I stopped and looked at the bottle to see what exactly I was using. Doesn't smell nice like the other Pantene Conditioners I've used. Going to have to put this bottle under my cabinet to use only when I'm desperate. Will go back to the other Pantene conditioners. And I will always open and smell any new shampoo or conditioner I buy. Review Title: Don't like minty smell. Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver Review Date: 2016/03/02 Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'} Review Text: Fantastic facial cleaning brush. I like that it has a pretty case to use if I ever travel with it. You can store the other brushes (comes with 3. One for massage, one for sensitive skin and one normal brush)
Great that the battery holds a charge for about 30 uses. Nice feature for when I'm on the road and don't want to bother with the charger at every hotel.
Has 3 speeds so you can decide on how much brushing you want on your face.
My face feels so clean after I'm done using it. I put on some night cream, with the massage brush, afterwards and my face is so smooth. I love it.
I'm also wondering how difficult it will be to find replacement brush heads. Review Title: Quick and easy facial cleaning in no time Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tweezers for Eyebrows, MORGLES 5PCS Tweezers for Women Precision Tweezers Set with Eyebrow Brush Leather Case for Eyebrow Ingrown Hair Removal Review Date: 2020/12/14 Store: MORGLES Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.73 x 4.06 x 0.75 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '616010018807', 'Manufacturer': 'MORGLES'} Review Text: It's so hard to find good tweezers that actually grab the hair. These tweezers seem to work nicely.
I tried 3 of them so far and I have no complaints.
The case is nice to keep them all organized and easy to find. The eyebrow brush was a nice addition to this set.
The curved scissors work great also.
Glad to have this set in my collection. Will make it so much easier when I need to do a bit of face grooming. Review Title: Nice variety Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: CAXIRO IPL Hair Removal Device for Women and Man, Permanent Reduction in Hair Regrowth for Body, Face & Precision Areas (Bikini and Underarms) Review Date: 2021/07/20 Store: CAXIRO Average Rating: 2.8 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.76 x 7.68 x 2.32 inches; 1.48 Pounds', 'UPC': '791324774318'} Review Text: I'll say it, I hate shaving. The older I get the more hair I get on my upper lip. Horrible.
So I am now trying this laser tool to see if it'll help with at least most of my unwanted hair.
I haven't been using it long. I clean and then I shave the areas that I want to laser treat.
I would say that after about 3 weeks/3 times a week, you'll see at least a little difference if not a big difference.
The device is easy to hold in one hand.
Says that it will last my lifetime. And it probably will. The most I'll be using it is the first month or two. After that I expect only maintenance use.
No counter to count down the number of used flashes. But it's okay. Not a big deal.
It does have to be plugged in. Again, not an issue. I only have it out, while using it, for about 10 mins tops. Takes me 2 seconds to plug it in.
Love having this. Anything that makes a day go a bit easier is okay with me. Review Title: Nice Laser Removal Tool Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Anghie Complete Kit for Beginners Review Date: 2021/09/03 Store: Anghie Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anghie', 'Size': 'Green-shader&liner', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 4.65 x 3.58 inches; 1.54 Pounds', 'UPC': '770240204666', 'Manufacturer': 'Anghie'} Review Text: After using different tattoo machines, this one is more just for beginners.
It's light and easy to use. Kit comes with almost everything needed to start practicing.
I wanted to see how good this machine would do with lines. It's okay but, the machine does get a bit on the warm side after having it run for about 60-90 mins.
All in all this kit is nice. Review Title: Nice machine Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts Review Date: 2021/09/20 Store: ZZLOVE Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} Review Text: I don't like the pump of this wash. It's so small that it takes so many pumps to get a small amount. I finally gave up and just poured it out of the bottle.
Scent....Not the greatest. It doesn't last long which is nice because it's not a scent I want to smell like when I get out of the shower.
Did lather nice. Rinsed off and I felt clean.
Maybe men would like this better than women. And some may like how it smells. Just not a scent for me. Review Title: It's just okay Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Review Date: 2021/10/11 Store: Cuckoo Product Description: ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} Review Text: I like the size of this. It's nice and small so it's easy to keep in my purse for when I need it.
Easy to use. Just roll on my face and it absorbs any oils without messing up my makeup.
Does come with a second ball.
Not sure how long the one ball will last since I just started using it. Seems that it would last quite a long time. Review Title: Nice and compact Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pinkiou Air Cushions BB Cream CC Cream Mushroomhead Foundation Moisturizing Concealer Hyaluronic Acid Molecule Deep Moisturizing Brightens the Complexion and Lasts for a Ｌong Ｔime（Ivory） Review Date: 2021/10/22 Store: Pinkiou Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pinkiou', 'Item Form': 'Cream,Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic acid', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 2.99 x 2.91 inches; 4.87 Ounces'} Review Text: Looking at the design of the case this is in, it looks like the smaller part of the top should open. If it is suppose to open, I can't figure it out. So, I just unscrewed the entire top off to use it. Not really a big issue.
The foundation itself is waterproof. Does last all day with no problem.
It's a nice smooth foundation. Easy to apply with the sponge that comes with this.
It does cover up some of the skin flaws.
It's an okay foundation for a decent price. Kept my skin soft all day.
Was easy enough to wash off at the end of the day. I would buy again. Review Title: How to open? Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit 2 Colors Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils, 1 Brush and 1 Razor, Dark Brown and Light Brown Review Date: 2021/11/26 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.67 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ES7010-2brown', 'UPC': '762403888318'} Review Text: I really love having so many stencils to choose from. When I found a couple I really liked, I numbered them so I'll remember which ones I like.
The powder is messy. Have to be so careful not to get any on myself because it will stain.
The color is nice for my brown/gray hair.
It takes a bit of trial and error when first using this kit. Not to dab too hard to have the powder go on way too dark. Finding the right stencil that fits my face.
I did a lot of scrubbing until I finally got the combination down. So far the color has lasted about 3 days. I'll use a brush to fine tune them a little.
Love having actual eyebrows again. Review Title: So many stencils Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Boiess Colognes Poppy mint For Moms, Babies & Kids | Natural Eau de Cologne | Clean & Fresh Scent | Children Fragrance For Soft & Sensitive Skin | Easy Use, Gentle on Baby | Size: 8.5 FL Oz Review Date: 2022/02/23 Store: Boiess Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Boiess', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Scent': 'Poppymint', 'Special Feature': 'Dermatoligist tested, Pediatrician tested, Clean, Natural, Cruelty Free, Plant based, Hypoallegenic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 2.17 x 2.17 inches; 8.5 Ounces', 'UPC': '860007057533', 'Country of Origin': 'Spain'} Review Text: I want to use this spray on the bedding. All the bedding. Makes it smell so nice for when we all go to bed. Just a nice fresh scent.
I can't really pick out a particular scent with this spray. It's a nice combination though.
With spring here and the windows open again, we're all loving having a nice fresh scent in our bedrooms and our beds using this spray. Review Title: smells nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BABOR Power Serum Ampoule: Beta Glucan | Calms, Strengthens, Soothes | 2D Hyaluronic Acid & Microsilver | Clean & Vegan | Visible Results in 7 Days Review Date: 2022/04/04 Store: Babor Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days.Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days. See more', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Babor', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.39 x 0.91 x 5.83 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': '400699'} Review Text: Not sure about the calming or soothing effects this is suppose to give my skin. But, my skin is feeling a lot softer after using this for 4 days now.
Easy to open and use. Just place rubber piece, that's included, over the top of a glass ample. Holding onto the rubber piece, bend and snap the glass top off. Turn the rubber top upside down to discard the piece of glass top.
Then pour liquid onto your palm and apply to face and neck. Absorbs within a few mins. Review Title: Skin is softer Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pantene Pro-V Damage Detox Rebuilding Conditioner 24 fl oz Review Date: 2015/01/05 Store: Pantene Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pantene', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Frizzy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '24 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4 x 2.8 inches; 1.77 Pounds', 'UPC': '080878177301', 'Manufacturer': 'Pantene'} Review Text: It does make my hair soft but, I can't take the minty smell it has! I use Pantene products all the time and was shocked when I was in the shower and put this conditioner on my head. I stopped and looked at the bottle to see what exactly I was using. Doesn't smell nice like the other Pantene Conditioners I've used. Going to have to put this bottle under my cabinet to use only when I'm desperate. Will go back to the other Pantene conditioners. And I will always open and smell any new shampoo or conditioner I buy. Review Title: Don't like minty smell. Great that the battery holds a charge for about 30 uses. Nice feature for when I'm on the road and don't want to bother with the charger at every hotel.
Has 3 speeds so you can decide on how much brushing you want on your face.
My face feels so clean after I'm done using it. I put on some night cream, with the massage brush, afterwards and my face is so smooth. I love it.
I'm also wondering how difficult it will be to find replacement brush heads. The older I get the more hair I get on my upper lip. Horrible.
So I am now trying this laser tool to see if it'll help with at least most of my unwanted hair.
I haven't been using it long. I clean and then I shave the areas that I want to laser treat.
I would say that after about 3 weeks/3 times a week, you'll see at least a little difference if not a big difference.
The device is easy to hold in one hand.
Says that it will last my lifetime. And it probably will. The most I'll be using it is the first month or two. After that I expect only maintenance use.
No counter to count down the number of used flashes. But it's okay. Not a big deal.
It does have to be plugged in. Again, not an issue. I only have it out, while using it, for about 10 mins tops. Takes me 2 seconds to plug it in.
Love having this. Anything that makes a day go a bit easier is okay with me. Review Title: Nice Laser Removal Tool Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Anghie Complete Kit for Beginners Review Date: 2021/09/03 Store: Anghie Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Anghie', 'Size': 'Green-shader&liner', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 4.65 x 3.58 inches; 1.54 Pounds', 'UPC': '770240204666', 'Manufacturer': 'Anghie'} Review Text: After using different tattoo machines, this one is more just for beginners.
It's light and easy to use. Kit comes with almost everything needed to start practicing.
I wanted to see how good this machine would do with lines. It's okay but, the machine does get a bit on the warm side after having it run for about 60-90 mins.
All in all this kit is nice. Review Title: Nice machine Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts Review Date: 2021/09/20 Store: ZZLOVE Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} Review Text: I don't like the pump of this wash. It's so small that it takes so many pumps to get a small amount. I finally gave up and just poured it out of the bottle.
Scent....Not the greatest. It doesn't last long which is nice because it's not a scent I want to smell like when I get out of the shower.
Did lather nice. Rinsed off and I felt clean.
Maybe men would like this better than women. And some may like how it smells. Just not a scent for me. Review Title: It's just okay Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller,Jade Roller Set Facial Beauty Tools,Face Roller Skin Massager for Face Review Date: 2021/10/11 Store: Cuckoo Product Description: ['Cuckoo Face Makeup Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller& Jade Roller', 'Why choose Cuckoo?', 'Cuckoo has one pc of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller and one pc of Jade roller. The oil-absorbing volcanic face roller can help you absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times. The jade roller can improve skin circulation, soothes your skin, reducing puffiness, wrinkling and fine lines to smooth your skin.', 'Advantage Of Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller', 'Prefect Oil Absorption Effect', 'Like oil-absorbing paper, but better.\xa0Roll through your face with volcanic stone balls to instantly absorb excess grease and keep your skin fresh and shiny at all times.', 'Reusable Use', 'Unlike blotting papers for oily skin that are used once and thrown out, this oil-absorbing roller is easy to clean make it reusable.', 'Special Design', 'Built-in special ball design, rolling is silkier and easier, gently or wherever the skin is shiny, rolling the face rollers.\xa0The oil on the face will disappear.', 'Easy To Carry', 'You don’t have to go rooting around your purse for blotting papers anymore.', 'Advantage Of Jade Roller', 'Natural Rose Quartz Jade', 'Natural approach to caring the skin, no dyes, sulfates, parabens or other chemicals. It is made of 100% natural Brazilian rose quartz jade stone.', 'No Crack& Scratch', "Use superb sanding technology to polish the surface of the jade many times. It is super fine and smooth so that don't scratch your skin.", 'Lifts and tighten skin& Improve the blood circulation& Smooth and reduce wrinkles& Reduces dark circles and puffiness'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Face Roller-1', 'Manufacturer': 'Cuckoo'} Review Text: I like the size of this. It's nice and small so it's easy to keep in my purse for when I need it.
Easy to use. Just roll on my face and it absorbs any oils without messing up my makeup.
Does come with a second ball.
Not sure how long the one ball will last since I just started using it. Seems that it would last quite a long time. Review Title: Nice and compact Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pinkiou Air Cushions BB Cream CC Cream Mushroomhead Foundation Moisturizing Concealer Hyaluronic Acid Molecule Deep Moisturizing Brightens the Complexion and Lasts for a Ｌong Ｔime（Ivory） Review Date: 2021/10/22 Store: Pinkiou Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pinkiou', 'Item Form': 'Cream,Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic acid', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 2.99 x 2.91 inches; 4.87 Ounces'} Review Text: Looking at the design of the case this is in, it looks like the smaller part of the top should open. If it is suppose to open, I can't figure it out. So, I just unscrewed the entire top off to use it. Not really a big issue.
The foundation itself is waterproof. Does last all day with no problem.
It's a nice smooth foundation. Easy to apply with the sponge that comes with this.
It does cover up some of the skin flaws.
It's an okay foundation for a decent price. Kept my skin soft all day.
Was easy enough to wash off at the end of the day. I would buy again. Review Title: How to open? Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit 2 Colors Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils, 1 Brush and 1 Razor, Dark Brown and Light Brown Review Date: 2021/11/26 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.67 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ES7010-2brown', 'UPC': '762403888318'} Review Text: I really love having so many stencils to choose from. When I found a couple I really liked, I numbered them so I'll remember which ones I like.
The powder is messy. Have to be so careful not to get any on myself because it will stain.
The color is nice for my brown/gray hair.
It takes a bit of trial and error when first using this kit. Not to dab too hard to have the powder go on way too dark. Finding the right stencil that fits my face.
I did a lot of scrubbing until I finally got the combination down. So far the color has lasted about 3 days. I'll use a brush to fine tune them a little.
Love having actual eyebrows again. Review Title: So many stencils Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Boiess Colognes Poppy mint For Moms, Babies & Kids | Natural Eau de Cologne | Clean & Fresh Scent | Children Fragrance For Soft & Sensitive Skin | Easy Use, Gentle on Baby | Size: 8.5 FL Oz Review Date: 2022/02/23 Store: Boiess Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Boiess', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Scent': 'Poppymint', 'Special Feature': 'Dermatoligist tested, Pediatrician tested, Clean, Natural, Cruelty Free, Plant based, Hypoallegenic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 2.17 x 2.17 inches; 8.5 Ounces', 'UPC': '860007057533', 'Country of Origin': 'Spain'} Review Text: I want to use this spray on the bedding. All the bedding. Makes it smell so nice for when we all go to bed. Just a nice fresh scent.
I can't really pick out a particular scent with this spray. It's a nice combination though.
With spring here and the windows open again, we're all loving having a nice fresh scent in our bedrooms and our beds using this spray. Review Title: smells nice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BABOR Power Serum Ampoule: Beta Glucan | Calms, Strengthens, Soothes | 2D Hyaluronic Acid & Microsilver | Clean & Vegan | Visible Results in 7 Days Review Date: 2022/04/04 Store: Babor Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days.Instantly calms, strengthens & soothes complexion while providing intense hydration. Visible results in 7 days. See more', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Babor', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.39 x 0.91 x 5.83 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': '400699'} Review Text: Not sure about the calming or soothing effects this is suppose to give my skin. But, my skin is feeling a lot softer after using this for 4 days now.
Easy to open and use. Just place rubber piece, that's included, over the top of a glass ample. Holding onto the rubber piece, bend and snap the glass top off. Turn the rubber top upside down to discard the piece of glass top.
Then pour liquid onto your palm and apply to face and neck. Absorbs within a few mins. Review Title: Skin is softer Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The person's shopping behavior reveals a strong preference for beauty and personal care products, particularly those focused on skin and hair improvement. They consistently value products providing effective results, indicated by high ratings for items that contribute to cleanliness, softness, and ease of use. A notable pattern emerges in their sensitivity to scents; negative sentiments arise from overpowering or unpleasant fragrances, highlighting a desire for pleasant, subtle scents.

Quality is prioritized, as evidenced by a tendency to prefer established brands known for specific functionalities, especially in hair and skincare. Despite this, there is an observable price sensitivity—ratings decline for products that don't meet expectations relative to their cost. 

The individual gravitates toward multifunctional products, such as cleansing tools and sophisticated beauty devices, signaling a preference for efficiency in their grooming routine. They express appreciation for organization (e.g., tweezers with cases) and ease of use (e.g., tools that simplify makeup application).

Overall, core preferences center on high-quality, user-friendly beauty essentials that offer effective performance, while being mindful of aesthetic details like fragrance and packaging design.

target_interaction.title: Works good
target_interaction.text:
I tested this out on my pugs the day it arrived. I first tested to make sure they didn't fight me too much when I stuck their feet inside of the cup. They didn't. So, I filled with warm water, stuck their foot inside, turned the cup, then pulled their feet out to dry.
Seemed to work good. I just want to be able to rinse their feet of any dirt, sand, pebbles, or anything else that gets stuck in their pads.
I like that it has a small handle so I can hook it up near the back door.
target_interaction.title_meta: Arkology Dog Paw Cleaner & Pet Grooming Brush - Medium Size, Green Portable Pet Paw Washer with Green Towel, Soft Silicone Brush and Green Silicon Strap
features: 🐕 【HIGH QUALITY】 : Made of soft silicone bristles. BPA free and comfort for pet paw in the process. Durable PET container that can be cleaned easily and long lasting for uses. It’s an innovative combination of dog paw washer and dog cleaning brush, you can clean your dog's paw, but also can removes the silicone lid separately to give your dog a gentle massage and bathing etc. Upgraded wear-resistant frosted bottle that enhanced friction and more comfortable to grip.

🐩 【MEDIUM SIZE AND EASY TO USE】 : Add some water to the dog paw cleaner, move the paw cleaner up and down, dry the paw. Once you are finished just towel dry the paws. Remove the lid and brush the hair when need. Cylindrical design allows you to effectively wash the muddy paw in hard-to-reach areas, and keeping the mess in paw cleaner cup to keep the house or car spotless. The mouth of the dog foot cleaner measures 5.9" and and Top Dia 3.85", suitable for all size pets.

🐕 【GENTLE & DURABLE】 : Paw Legend Dog feet cleaner Uses soft silicone technology to effectively get rid of stubborn bits of dirt or mud. Great solution for walking dogs in all seasons and all weather condition.

🐩 【A BETTER COMFORT AND WELLBEING FOR YOUR PET】: Apart from our dogs’ happy, clean paws can also protect carpets, flooring, and furniture throughout the house. Easy removing all the muds and dirts after outdoor activities.

🐕 【 TOWEL INCLUDED and CUSTOMER SERVICE 】An additional hyper-fabric towel for drying out the paws for your beloved pets with ease and great water absorbent materials. Wipe of the water after cleaning the paws. This product is a great gift set for friends with pets! Customer service is 24 hours active for our clients, we will offer prompt response regarding any inquiries of our products.
